scripts.start: yarn clean && yarn build:server && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.local.js && yarn copyPublic && yarn start:server
scripts.start:development: yarn clean && yarn build:server && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.development.js && yarn copyPublic && yarn start:server
scripts.start:production: yarn clean && yarn build:server && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.production.js && yarn copyPublic && yarn start:server
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:server && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.local.js
scripts.build:development: webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.development.js && cp -r public dist/public
scripts.build:production: webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.development.js && cp -r public dist/public
